name: Soundscape Classic
description: Get teleported to a psychedelic world of music and light in the classic version of Soundscape! For the best experience and visuals, be sure to download the latest version - http://store.steampowered.com/app/636930 - and stay tuned for regular upgrades!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 3570k Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or equivalent Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 6900k / i7 ryzen Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Storage: 6 GB available space
